Question
========

A stochastic variable X follows a normal distribution, X \~ N(1, 0.5^2^). For what value *a* does P(X \< *a*) = 20% ?

Answerlist
----------

* -0.84
* -0.42
* 0.42
* 0.58

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.84: Incorrect
-0.42: Incorrect
* 0.42: Incorrect
* 0.58: Correct
